attributes.action: Resign or call a spring election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The failure of the Prime Minister Gordon Brown to call an election this year has denied citizens of the UK to vote for a change, another two years of labour 'rule' under this man is too long. Call a spring election or go, let the people decide democratically.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
